teams.name: Falcons
teams.description: Known for their strategic gameplay and swift attacks, the Falcons dominate the field with precision.

teams.name: Wild Thunders
teams.description: An electrifying team with an aggressive playstyle, always pushing the limits of competition.

teams.name: Team Spirit
teams.description: A team that thrives on unity and motivation, proving that teamwork makes the dream work.

teams.name: Masters
teams.description: A seasoned group of players with exceptional skills and years of experience in the sport.

teams.name: Brutal Soldiers
teams.description: Fearless and relentless, the Brutal Soldiers never back down from a challenge.

teams.name: Dominators
teams.description: A powerhouse of talent and determination, always setting new records in the game.

teams.name: Phantom
teams.description: A mysterious team with unpredictable tactics, often surprising their opponents with clever maneuvers.

teams.name: Rising Stars
teams.description: A young and energetic team with the potential to become future champions.
